articles.author: Andrew McMurtry
articles.title: Club cricketer’s viral feat goes worldwide
articles.description: It’s not often that a feat in any third grade cricket competition can make headlines around the world, but Mudgeeraba Nerang & Districts Cricket Club captain Gareth Morgan has done just that.
articles.content:
It’s not often that a feat in any third grade cricket competition can make headlines around the world, but Mudgeeraba Nerang & Districts Cricket Club captain Gareth Morgan has done just that.

articles.title: What we learned from watching the 1992 World Cup final in full again | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.description: Wides, lbw calls, swing - plenty of things were different in white-ball cricket back then | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.content: Last week, we at ESPNcricinfo did something we have been thinking of doing for eight years now: pretend-live ball-by-ball commentary for a classic cricket match. We knew the result, yes, but we tried… [+6823 chars]
